title: 093: Creating an Authentic Brand with Lauryn and Michael of The Skinny Confidential
itunes:title: 093: Creating an Authentic Brand with Lauryn and Michael of The Skinny Confidential
description:
Social media can be daunting but it’s the most powerful tool we have to share our message, create businesses and connect with others.

In this episode, I sat down with wife and husband duo Lauryn Evarts and Michael Bosstick of The Skinny Confidential to discuss all things working with your partner and building a brand.

We discuss:
-How to balance work and life when working with your partner
-How to authentically show up on Instagram
-Building your personal brand
-Instagram stories—worth it or waste of time?

If you’re interested in building a thriving personal brand, this episode is for you!

Check out Lauryn’s blog theskinnyconfidential.com @theskinnyconfidential.


Be part of a community that supports you discovering your dharma in Rose Gold Goddesses, the sacred sisterhood collective with community, content, creativity and so much more — learn more about rosegoldgoddesses.com.

Get 35% off your order of Youveda supplements at youveda.com with code “sahara”

Intro + Outro Music: Silent Ganges by Maneesh de Moor

Discover your Dharma with my free quiz at https://iamsahararose.com/

Connect with me for daily Ayurvedic and modern spiritual wisdom at: Instagram.com/iamsahararose
Facebook.com/iamsahararose Twitter.com/iamsahararose

Order My Books Eat Feel Fresh + Idiot's Guide to Ayurveda: https://www.iamsahararose.com/books
